name: One Two Three
description:
One Two Three

Tired of your candy getting crushed, your jewels getting be'd, or something like that? Instead try something as easy as one, two, three!

Click two adjacent tiles to swap them. Match 3 in a row to score. Multi- and combo-matches for bigger scores. Matching bigger numbers gives bigger scores. Each match adds to your time. How high can you score?

Made with Unity engine by Deplorable Mountaineer.
